text: Can you help me change my password?
Sure, I can help you with that. I just need some information to authenticate your account. Can you please provide me with your email and current password?
My username is user1 and my current password is user1pass.
Thank you. Before we change your password, we need to generate a token to authenticate your account. Let me call the GetUserToken API.
Great, now we have the token we need. What would you like your new password to be?
My new password will be newpassword123.
Perfect, let's go ahead and call the ModifyPassword API to update your password.
Your password has been successfully changed. Is there anything else I can assist you with?
You're welcome. Have a great day!
